properties.name: app.api.key
properties.description: Application's API key to access to services.

properties.name: vb.baseUrl
properties.description: Viber's server URL to access to it's API.

properties.name: tg.baseUrl
properties.description: Telegram's server URL to access to it's API.

properties.name: tg.chatId
properties.description: Telegram's Chat ID to send messages to.

properties.name: app.api.key.parameter
properties.description: Name of Notifier Application API Key parameter.

properties.name: mx.baseUrl
properties.description: Matrix server URL to access to it's API.

properties.name: mx.bot.user
properties.description: Matrix user name to access to API, Rooms, ets.

properties.name: mx.bot.default.roomid
properties.description: Matrix default Room ID to send messages to.

properties.name: vb.media.folder
properties.description: Local folder to store uploaded files to.

properties.name: vb.media.clear_temp
properties.description: When true then Application will delete oldest uploaded files.

properties.name: vb.media.clear_interval.days
properties.description: Time interval to uploaded files will be stored.

properties.name: app.baseUrl
properties.description: Application's base URL. Used to send files to Viber and to upload files.

properties.name: app.files.url.path
properties.description: URL prefix to files upload path.

properties.name: mx.session.lifetime
properties.description: Matrix-Synapse session's lifetime. Used to update Application's session connection to sever.
